snippet: Following a barrel bomb attack on a school in Aleppo, the emergency relief coordinator of the United Nations said a Security Council resolution had failed to bring relief to Syrians in need.
abstract: Valerie Amos, United Nations emergency relief coordinator in Syria, says Security Council resolution to provide aid to Syrians trapped behind front lines has failed to bring results; urges Council to recognize reality and act on it.
lead_paragraph: Following a barrel bomb attack on a school in Aleppo, the emergency relief coordinator of the United Nations said a Security Council resolution had failed to bring relief to Syrians in need.

headline.main: Stronger Action Required on Syria, Aid Chief Warns
headline.print_headline: Stronger Action Required on Syria, Aid Chief Warns
